description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Rolling Hot Balls: A Love Story is a catastrophically entertaining 3D-platformer in which the player must roll and jump his way across 29 heart-cramping levels, avoiding despicable enemies and other hazards in order to reach the goal!
description.short: Rolling Hot Balls: A Love Story is a catastrophically entertaining 3D-platformer in which the player must roll and jump his way across 29 heart-cramping levels, avoiding despicable enemies and other hazards in order to reach the goal!
